name: MMA WARS social/mobile game
blurb: MMA WARS is the most fun way to train for and fight your friends, gamers, and Pros, without ending up in the emergency room!

rewards.reward: Invited in the game\u2019s first-look beta user group\r\n+Digital Thank You Postcard, featuring distinctive artwork\r\n+Bonus code in the postcard to unlock virtual currency in the game
Each item from the prior level PLUS:\r\n+An official MMA WARS supporter digital Badge (can post on Facebook, etc.)   \r\n+$5 in virtual currency for use in the game

Each item from the prior level PLUS:
+Special Thanks on our MMAWARS.COM site as “CHARTER SUPPORTER”
+Custom pair of virtual MMA WARS gloves in the game 
+$10 in virtual currency for use in the game

Each item from the prior level PLUS:\r\n+Digital poster of the Academy Award-nominated \u201cWARRIOR\u201d movie (inspiration behind MMA WARS) signed by filmmaker Gregory O\u2019Connor \r\n+$20 in virtual currency for use in the game

Each item from the prior level PLUS:
+Special Recognition in the game and on our MMAWARS.COM site as “CHARTER WARRIOR”
+Digitally sent original concept art from MMA WARS game (signed by the artists) 
+$35 in virtual currency for use in the game

Each item from the prior level PLUS:
+Three special virtual items
+DVD of the Academy Award-nominated “WARRIOR” movie (inspiration behind MMA WARS) signed by filmmaker Gregory O’Connor 
+$125 in virtual currency for use in the game (you can gift any amount of this to friends/other players if you wish)

Each item from the prior level PLUS:
+Custom limited edition “SOAL” (stands for “Soul of a Lion”) T-shirt, designed specifically for and worn in the Academy Award-nominated “WARRIOR” movie  
+Gloves signed by a Pro Fighter in the game or the “WARRIOR” movie
+$300 in virtual currency for use in the game (you can gift any amount of this to friends/other players if you wish)

Each item from the prior level PLUS: 
+Official “WARRIOR” movie poster, signed by filmmaker Gregory O’Connor and one of the Pro Fighters in the cast
+Item signed by Pro/Olympic Gold Winner Kurt Angle (who played a Russian MMA fighter in “WARRIOR”) and is a fighter in MMA WARS
+$750 in virtual currency for use in the game (you can gift any amount of this to friends/other players if you wish)

Each item from the prior level PLUS: 
+Become “FIGHT PROMOTER” Character in the game
+Have a personal call or Skype session with Pro/Olympic Gold winner and “WARRIOR” and MMA WARS star Kurt Angle
+Personal call, Skype, or Lunch (travel at your cost) with “WARRIOR” filmmaker and MMA WARS co-creator Gregory O’Connor
+$2,000 in virtual currency for use in the game (you can gift any amount of this to friends/other players if you wish)

Each item from the prior level PLUS: 
+Become “COMMISSIONER” character in the game 
+Commissioner Cup Trophy prominently featured in the game, bearing your name (6 months) 
+You can be embedded on the mat, posts, or other "sponsor" places in the game (6 months)
+Crown a Maxim or other winning MMA WARS Ring Girl (you are responsible for any travel costs – to either where she is, or NYC, or Hollywood, CA.)
+$5,000 in virtual currency for use in the game (you can gift any amount of this to friends/other players if you wish)
